headline: VMC Q1 Earnings Call: Profitability Gains Offset Revenue Miss Amid Mixed Market Demand
summary: Construction materials company Vulcan Materials (NYSE:VMC) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 5.8% year on year to $1.63 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1 per share was 31.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
